text: Decio Pavani (born 15 June 1891, date of death unknown) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Decio Pavani
